An expert who knows a specific title of esports in-depth, the teams involved, and current strategies. Caster (also called Shoutcaster) is the gaming term for a commentator at a live event.

Creator of digital audiovisual content. Camera operator: Canon EOS 77D. Audio operator: SHURE SM7B + Cloudlifter and Focusrite 4i4 3rd generation. Stream on Twitch and engage with followers in an incredible adventure.

recomendaciones.recomendacion: I had the privilege of meeting Miguel in our Project Management course. Miguel brought value to every class discussion and group project. He is incredibly emotionally intelligent and helped motivate and challenge us. Miguel rolls up his sleeves and takes on any challenge with positivity, innovation, and creativity.
